Description:
Best Kept Secret on 896sqm!
A great home, investment or development opportunity awaits the successful buyer! Set on an impressive 896sqm, the existing property features 3 bedrooms with built-in-robes and a contemporary bathroom with separate shower and bath. Combining original and modern touches, this family home boasts three living zones including lounge, dining and living rooms. An updated kitchen offers ample bench space, breakfast bar, upright oven and stove. Additional highlights include air conditioning, gas heating and rear deck which is an ideal entertainment space, while the enormous backyard is secure ensuring comfort and privacy. A large single garage with workshop completes the home. Situated within walking distance to schools, shops, Corio Village and just a couple of turns and you're on the Ring Road. Act now to secure your future today!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 15 Merlin Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Immaculate Family Home"
Surrounded by quality built homes and within walking distance to schools, shops, medical facilities and public transport is this fantastic family home. Set on a large 606m2 block (approx) consisting of 3 good sized bedrooms, ensuite and walk in robe to main, an open plan kitchen/dining area and a large living area. Outside is a large all-weather outdoor entertainment area. A double garage with rear access to the back yard with views to the You Yangs. Within a minutes drive to the Geelong Ring Road for Geelong and Surf Coast commuters and public transport available at your doorstep.
-Large 606m2 Block (approx)
-Heating and Cooling
-Large Double Garage with Rear Access
-Neat and Tidy, Low Maintenance Gardens
-Close to Schools, Shops & Transport
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent

Description:
The hard work has already been done.
This delightful home offers purchasers a chance to secure an updated 3 bedroom home on a generous allotment of approx. 697m2 in one of Corio's most sought after locations!
The home comprises of 3 carpeted bedrooms, updated central bathroom with separate toilet, spacious lounge upon entry, updated kitchen with room for a meals area, double carport and garage with large adjoining workshop.
Featuring plenty of cupboard and bench space in the kitchen, gas cooking and air conditioning. The rear yard itself offers an abundance of space with undercover pergola and additional deck for entertaining family and friends, 2 garden sheds and manicured gardens.
Within walking distance to the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools and just a 10 minute drive to the Geelong CBD and 50 minutes to Melbourne.
Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this property!
Insights: 20 Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Great Value Home or Investment Situated in a Quiet Court Location!"
Nestled in a quiet court location on a 530sqm block (approx) lies this beautifully presented 3 bedroom brick veneer home with ample living spaces for the whole family to enjoy. Whether you're searching for a neat investment opportunity or family home this property is sure to tick a lot of boxes. Outdoor presents fantastic entertaining with an enormous undercover alfresco leaving plenty of space for backyard cricket. Easy access to the Ring Road brings Melbourne under an hour away and Geelong CBD only 15 minutes, along with the Corio Shopping Centre within walking distance, bus stops close by, local school and sporting grounds. Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this property!
- 3 Bedrooms, main with ensuite
- Formal lounge plus second living
- Well appointed kitchen with s/steel 900mm 5 burner gas cooker
- Main bathroom with corner spa
- Gas log fire, air conditioner & ceiling fans
- Enormous undercover alfresco
- Double garage with drive through access
- Ample backyard
- Estimated rental return is $380 per week
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Occupy or Invest – the choice is yours!
Clearly owner-occupied, this solid well-maintained home is perfect for the family or investor looking to capitalise on this growth area with such great access to Melbourne.
A skylight fills the open-plan kitchen/dining/family room with light, and an additional living space at the front of the home is perfect for when you want some space. All 3 bedrooms have built-in robes and share a central bathroom with separate toilet
.
The backyard boasts a beautiful decked undercover alfresco right off the family room, perfect for entertaining. There’s also plenty of space for the kids or pets but not so much you’ll lose your weekend maintaining it!
An updated kitchen, polished floorboards, LED downlights, a wall heater and split system make this home feel incredibly comfortable all year ‘round.
You’ll love having a double garage, double carport + shed - perfect for the handyman or plenty of space for cars if you have multiple tenants.
Commuting to Melbourne has never been easier with the Geelong Ring Road and Princes Hwy just moments away, and you can be in Geelong CBD within 15mins. With a bus stop conveniently located just around the corner, you are also walking distance to St Francis Xavier School, Corio Village Shopping Centre and a number of recreation reserves - you may not even need a car!
Situated in a very quiet court location and surrounded by other owner-occupied homes, this one is a cut above the rest and is sure to go quick – enquire now!
Insights: 19 Lowrey Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Semi Renovated One Bedroom Unit
This one bedroom unit is in great condition and is situated in a complex of three. Living room with floorboards and also a ceiling fan for the warmer days and gas heating for the cooler nights. Open plan kitchen with gas appliances which also leads out to the oversized courtyard. Main bedroom with ample built in robes and combined bathroom and laundry with separate toilet. Single carport which also includes a secure lockable garden shed. Walking distance to public transport, schools, Corio Village and only moments away from the Ring Road. Currently leased out to great tenants at $185pw until February 2019.

Description:
Immaculate Townhouse Living in Ideal Location
If you have been searching for a stunning, low maintenance, near new investment property, on its own title, to add to your property portfolio or a place to call home close to all important amenities, in a highly sought after location, then you cannot look past this immaculate three bedroom townhouse.
Showcasing a contemporary, modern decor with neutral tones throughout. Freshly painted with new carpets placed to the bedrooms.
Offering a well thought out floor plan with built in robes to each of the three bedrooms and TV points cleverly appointed inside the robes saving space.
A two way bathroom services the master bedroom with built in bath, separate shower and ideally located separate toilet.
A central hallway leads directly through to the open concept kitchen living and dining spaces.
The galley style kitchen itself features a wide, long bench and is complete with stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher plus ample storage space. Adjacent sits the large living zone with direct access to the light bright courtyard via sliding doors. A designated dining area ensures room for all gatherings in this open area.
Ducted heating and split system A/C ensure comfortable living conditions all year round.
Secure off street parking is available with a single car garage with direct internal access to the home from the garage via the laundry.
Only minutes to both the Ring Road, shopping centres, schools, parklands, sporting facilities and public transport.
Be sure to add this exemplary, stand- alone, townhouse to your inspection list.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Insights: 147B Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Corio's best kept secret.
This beautifully updated family home set on a large block of approx. 675m2 is a must see for anyone wishing to purchase in the booming suburb of Corio!
The home comprises of 3 carpeted bedrooms (all with BIR's), updated kitchen and dining area, large living room, central bathroom which services the home with separate toilet, large rear yard with single garage and garden shed.
Featuring floating floorboards through the kitchen and dining area, recently painted living room and bedrooms, central heating throughout, ample cupboard and bench space in the kitchen, air conditioning and roller shutters to the windows.
Enjoy easy access to the Geelong Ring Road, bringing Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong's CBD only 15 minutes drive. Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this affordable, comfortable home today!

Description:
Potential Investment or The Perfect Start
Are you looking for the perfect entry into the market or wanting to add to your investment portfolio? Then this corner block address is sure to impress!
This well presented home will not disappoint. A solid brick veneer house comprises three bedrooms with built in robes, a modern bathroom and a light filled living area with air conditioning and gas heating. A neatly presented kitchen with electric wall oven, gas cook top and plenty of cupboard space. The open plan kitchen/dining room overlooks and opens out to a decking/BBQ area, making this ideal for those who love to entertain family and friends. The undercover alfresco is coupled with the spacious back yard.
This property has the complete package with a single garage, garden shed, back gate access and alarm system.
Whether you want to add to your investment portfolio, move in or create your own touches of style and enjoy the transformation, this property is ideal.
Set in a quite court and convenient location; close to schools, easy access to the Ring Road for the keen commuter, public transport and the bustling Corio shopping precinct, offering all the services you could want and need. In a sought-after pocket, this property should be at the top of your inspection list.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!

Description:
Gorgeous, Immaculate Presentation in Quiet Court Location!!
This beautifully presented 3 bedroom brick home is perfect for a young family! Immaculately presented frontage with manicured front yard. All securely fenced in for a safe environment for your pets and children, along with a great cubbyhouse. Has a lovely paved entertaining area where you can sit back have a BBQ and a few drinks whilst entertaining friends or family and still see your kids enjoying the sunshine. The house comprises of 3 bedrooms, master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite. Bedrooms 2 & 3 both with built in robes, so plenty of cupboard space throughout. Main bathroom has separate shower and corner spa. Great kitchen with dishwasher, electric oven and cooktop which then leads out to the open plan family and dining area. Upon entry you are welcomed by a formal living room. Coonara log heating, along with a gas wall heater and split system cooling in the front living space. The laundry has plenty of storage and has a separate access down the side of the house. The property also has a water tank installed and a single lock-up garage. A top of the list inspection is definitely a must!!
**Photo ID Required for Inspection**

Description:
Family home.
Positioned on a generously sized block of 535m2 (approx.) this charming home is sure to catch your eye. A perfect start for first home buyers or investors alike. This exciting home provides 3 comfortable sized carpeted bedrooms a generous lounge at the front of the property. The separate kitchen overlooks the backyard perfect to keep an eye on the little ones. The property has ceiling fans throughout. Outside provides a large outdoor area with a cubby house included. Conveniently located just a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, local schools and Water World. This is sure to be a property you don't want to miss. Don't wait another minute to book an inspection.

Description:
You'll Miss Out If You Think Twice
Situated on a large 638m2 block (approx) this neat and tidy family home has been lovingly owned and kept in great condition. Taking advantage of the great location and close proximity to all amenities including the Princes Highway the home consists of three good sized bedrooms large lounge with gas heating, neat and tidy kitchen joining to a meals area, central bathroom, single powered garage plus carport. With wide driveway access to the rear yard making it easy to add a second dwelling (STCA) you will need to be quick because at this price the property won't last long. Perfectly situated in a convenient location only minutes from Corio Shopping Centre, Princes Hwy, quality schools for all ages and much more, this home is sure to tick all your boxes. Inspections are a must!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
One Of A Kind
Stylishly renovated throughout with all the modern conveniences, this family home is move in ready. Set on a generous 613sqm allotment, the floorplan consists of a separate study incorporating built-in shelving and desk, plus three bedrooms with built-in-robes and ceiling fans; master with ensuite. The sleek kitchen with glass splashback, stone benchtops, dishwasher, stainless steel appliances and island bench is perfect for entertaining and opens onto a spacious open-plan living and dining room with direct access to the covered outdoor entertainment area. A secure rear yard offers workshop and garden shed, while a double inline garage and second cross over provides ample off-street parking for cars, a boat, caravan or trailer. Additional features include downlights throughout, central heating and cooling, high fencing, additional storage and external shutters. Located close to shops, schools, public transport and with easy access to the ring road, this attractive property is an ideal for first home buyers, families and investors alike!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Attention first home buyers and investors.
Conveniently located in a quiet street this well presented 3 bedroom home on a 583m2 approx. block is ready & waiting. With floorboards upon entry which flow through the home boasting 3 generous sized bedrooms all with BIR's, light filled living area with wall heater and ceiling fan. The updated kitchen provides plenty of bench and cupboard space and an adjoining dining area. The central bathroom services the home also providing a separate toilet and laundry with rear yard access. The secure rear yard with pergola, garden shed and a low maintenance grassed yard. Location is ideal, just a short commute to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway. This home really does have it all! Currently tenanted, be sure to enquire today before it's too late.
